foreignData.name: Engel der Wiederherstellung
foreignData.text:
Aufblitzen
Fliegend
Wenn der Engel der Wiederherstellung ins Spiel kommt, kannst du eine Nicht-Engel-Kreatur deiner Wahl, die du kontrollierst, ins Exil schicken und sie dann unter deiner Kontrolle ins Spiel zurückbringen.

foreignData.name: Ángel de la restitución
foreignData.text:
Destello.
Vuela.
Cuando el Ángel de la restitución entre al campo de batalla, puedes exiliar la criatura objetivo que controlas que no sea un Ángel, luego regresa esa carta al campo de batalla bajo tu control.

foreignData.name: Ange de la restauration
foreignData.text:
Flash
Vol
Quand l'Ange de la restauration arrive sur le champ de bataille, vous pouvez exiler une créature non-Ange ciblée que vous contrôlez, puis renvoyer cette carte sur le champ de bataille sous votre contrôle.

foreignData.name: Angelo della Restaurazione
foreignData.text:
Lampo
Volare
Quando l'Angelo della Restaurazione entra nel campo di battaglia, puoi esiliare una creatura non Angelo bersaglio che controlli, poi rimettere quella carta sul campo di battaglia sotto il tuo controllo.

foreignData.name: 修復の天使
foreignData.text:
瞬速
飛行
修復の天使が戦場に出たとき、あなたがコントロールしていて天使でないクリーチャー１体を対象とする。あなたは「それを追放する。その後、そのカードをあなたのコントロール下で戦場に戻す。」を選んでもよい。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — 天使

foreignData.name: Anjo da Restauração
foreignData.text:
Lampejo
Voar
Quando Anjo da Restauração entra no campo de batalha, você pode exilar uma criatura alvo que você controle que não seja Anjo e depois devolvê-la ao campo de batalha sob seu controle.

foreignData.name: Ангел Восстановления
foreignData.text:
Миг
Полет
Когда Ангел Восстановления выходит на поле битвы, вы можете изгнать не являющееся Ангелом целевое существо под вашим контролем, затем вернуть ту карту на поле битвы под вашим контролем.

foreignData.name: 复归天使
foreignData.text:
闪现
飞行
当复归天使进战场时，你可以放逐目标由你操控的非天使生物，然后将该牌在你的操控下移回战场。

foreignData.name: 復歸天使
foreignData.text:
閃現
飛行
當復歸天使進戰場時，你可以放逐目標由你操控的非天使生物，然後將該牌在你的操控下移回戰場。

name: Restoration Angel
originalText:
Flash
Flying
When Restoration Angel enters the battlefield, you may exile target non-Angel creature you control, then return that card to the battlefield under your control.

rulings.text: Once the exiled creature returns, it’s considered a new object with no relation to the object that it was. Auras attached to the exiled creature will be put into their owners’ graveyards. Equipment attached to the exiled creature will become unattached and remain on the battlefield. Any counters on the exiled creature will cease to exist.
If a token is exiled this way, it will cease to exist and won’t return to the battlefield.

When an effect returns the exiled card “under your control,” you control it indefinitely after that. If you had temporarily gained control of a creature, it won’t return to its previous controller. In a multiplayer game, if a player leaves the game, all cards that player owns leave as well. If you leave the game, a creature you took with Restoration Angel’s effect is exiled.

text:
Flash
Flying
